ai-tika-vin08t19:9_2: If you eat what has been stored indoors in a monastery, and cooked by yourselves, you commit three offenses of wrong conduct.
ai-tika-vin08t19:9_3: If you eat what has been stored indoors in a monastery, cooked indoors in a monastery, but cooked by others, you commit two offenses of wrong conduct.

ai-tika-vin08t19:9_7: If you eat what has been stored outside, and cooked indoors in a monastery, but cooked by others, you commit one offense of wrong conduct.
ai-tika-vin08t19:9_8: If you eat what has been stored outside, and cooked outside, but cooked by yourselves, you commit one offense of wrong conduct.
